item.description:
ORAGNIZER: Will
CONTACT: http://photo.meetup.c...
WHO: All members

this Event runs August 3rd to the 5th and Balloon launches are typically 6am / 6pm with weather permiting

FEES
Entrance Fee: FREE
Parking (Saturday) $5 per car (non-refundable).

Food, beverages, inflatable games, helicopter rides, and tethered hot air balloon rides ALL have charges.

I'm aiming to get in as many launches as possible for the Morning and Evening

I will also be doing other shoots between the launches, mostly looking at what the small town has historically

also those interested in possibly carpooling we could meet at the Park and Ride off of Exit 7 in Epping, NH or we can work on making other arrangements via discussing them on the Msg Board (keep in mind will have to meet up really early to get there before the 6am Launch time)

any questions plz feel free to Email me,
~Will

*** plz note the time is the time to get on location and have time to set up and get settled in (I'll be getting up at 3:30 am)

Link:Pittsfield New Hampshire's Rotary Hot Air Balloon Rally
item.name: Pittsfield, NH Hot Air Balloon Festival
